## Mouse

The gene of the day is Myo7a (id MGI:104510).

Phenotypes associated with this gene include:

 - MP:0001262
 - MP:0011967 and many more.


## Human

The human ortholog is MYO7A (HGNC:7606) located on chr11:76,839,310-76,926,286.

Some common variants in this gene:

 - 11:76869348 G / A
 - 11:76873367 G / T
